abstract: Patrik Edsparr, the former executive at JPMorgan Chase who set off a heap of controversy last year when he left to join Citadel Investment Group, is suing his former employer over an unpaid bonus.
snippet: Patrik Edsparr, the former executive at JPMorgan Chase who set off a heap of controversy last year when he left to join Citadel Investment Group, is suing his former employer over an unpaid bonus.
lead_paragraph: Patrik Edsparr, the former executive at JPMorgan Chase who set off a heap of controversy last year when he left to join Citadel Investment Group, is suing his former employer over an unpaid bonus.

headline.main: Ex-JPMorgan Executive Sues Over Unpaid Bonus
